name: SunRiser
0:
”Alexa open sun riser”
”Alexa start sun riser”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sun riser
des:
Sun Riser will tell you what time the sunrise or sunset is based on your device location.

Great for runners, cyclist or any outdoor enthusiast that needs a quick and easy way to know when the sunrise or sunset will be. The goal of the skill is to create a simple, intuitive way to get the information in a hurry.

When you say "Alexa, open Sun Riser", the skill will respond with based on the time of day:
 Morning: the time of today's sunrise
 Afternoon: the time of today's sunset
 Evening: the time of tomorrow's sunrise

Alexa will prompt you if you would like to hear more and by responding "Yes", you hear more detailed information for today's and tomorrow's sunrise/sunset.

*** Note: you must allow the device location permissions for the skill to work. If the permissions are not found, you will be prompted for the permissions in the Alexa App.
